thread.title: Couple seek ‘miracle’ drug for child’s life-threatening condition
thread.title_full: Couple seek ‘miracle’ drug for child’s life-threatening condition

author: Rachel Flaherty
title: Couple seek ‘miracle’ drug for child’s life-threatening condition
text:
Couple seek ‘miracle’ drug for child’s life-threatening condition Drug approved by US authorities but not yet by EU a ‘major breakthrough’, says specialist 24 minutes ago 
Stephen, Brigetta and Nellie Lannen, who who has spinal muscular atrophy type one, a rare genetic condition. 
Nellie Lannen was diagnosed with SMA1 when she was seven months old. Previous Image Next Image The parents of a young child with a rare genetic condition are seeking access to a new drug they believe could save their daughter’s life.
